seed_pair.target: Ella me siguió hasta las tiendas.
seed_pair.known: She followed me down to the shops.

seed_pair.target: Por mucho que argumenté todavía tuve que compartir.
seed_pair.known: However much I argued I still had to share.

seed_pair.target: Tuve que compartir mis juguetes con mi hermana.
seed_pair.known: I had to share my toys with my sister.
I need to lie down in the garden.

seed_pair.target: Y necesito cerrar los ojos por un rato.
seed_pair.known: And I need to close my eyes for a while.

seed_pair.target: Sospecho que ha oído cien historias sobre ello.
seed_pair.known: I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.

seed_pair.target: Ha oído mil historias sobre lo que estaban haciendo.
seed_pair.known: He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.

seed_pair.target: Habría estado feliz de conducir si me lo hubieras dicho.
seed_pair.known: I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.

seed_pair.target: Habría conducido si me hubieras dicho lo cansado que estabas.
seed_pair.known: I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.
